That's a pet peeve of mine, as well, Goop. It usually happens in the reverse, I'm excited to see CCE on a click, then look up and see that they artificially lowered the AV/DV for that click so it's just normal. A 4 DV is good, though. Five clicks of Impervious and a couple clicks of Regeneration, which I'd rather have end-dial than an almost meaningless Toughness. A little free movement (because the Blob is all about sidestepping). I think that's a solid common for 50 points.
